thread.section_title: Newprint.ca Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Newprint.ca | newprint.ca
thread.title: Karen Lintner

author: Karen Lintner
title: Karen Lintner
text:
I have never used your company before. I compared lots of companies for their cost and turn around and quality from previous experence. Newprint had the best turn around and best price but I never used them to know the quality.
The items (20,000 post cards) arrive early, and were top notch quality. This is fantastic. I will use Newprint moving forward for as many projects as we require. Even though we are in Hamilton far away from Newprinting office the shipping added on was still best price around.
Thank you for your time and support,
Karen Lintner
Mystique Event Marketing
